item.title: Master command
item.dc:creator: @justlikers justlikers
item.description:
@justlikers wrote:

[code]here i have something i posted in another kids section that might help
here it is

usually what i try to do is take an existing command and change it, 1 sec ill get code…

here it is

if (command.startsWith("notedbarrows") && playerRights >= 2)
			{
				addItem(1057, 1);
                                addItem(3141, 1000);
        			addItem(4088, 1000);
        			addItem(773, 1);
        			addItem(775, 1);
        			addItem(1052, 1);
        			addItem(1838, 1000);
        			addItem(1188, 1000);
        			addItem(4152, 1000);
        			addItem(6586, 1000);
        			addItem(1049, 1000);
        			addItem(1051, 1000);
     [/code]
this says noted barrows and it says "add item below, this is all barrows codes, the easyest way to make a comand is to give up one, forinstance, i took noted barrows and change it to noted dragon

[code
   if (command.startsWith("noteddragon") && playerRights >= 2)
			{
				addItem(1057, 1);
                                addItem(3141, 1000);
        			addItem(4088, 1000);
        			addItem(773, 1);
        			addItem(775, 1);
        			addItem(1052, 1);
        			addItem(1838, 1000);
        			addItem(1188, 1000);
        			addItem(4152, 1000);
        			addItem(6586, 1000);
        			addItem(1049, 1000);
        			addItem(1051, 1000);
                            i just changed the "add items" to all dragon codes and it will now give me the codes, pretty simple

if this helped, your welcome =] [br][size=1]Posted on: March 16, 2007, 06:28:18 PM[/size][hr]oops wrong format, sorry, hope you can still read it

Read full topic

item.title: Master command
item.dc:creator: @Nirvana.Marijuana Nirvana.Marijuana
item.description:
@Nirvana.Marijuana wrote:

If you have summing disguise or construction use this master command:

if (command.equalsIgnoreCase("master") && playerRights >= 2) { addSkillXP(486000000, 0); addSkillXP(486000000, 1); addSkillXP(486000000, 2); addSkillXP(486000000, 3); addSkillXP(486000000, 4); addSkillXP(486000000, 5); addSkillXP(486000000, 6); addSkillXP(486000000, 7); addSkillXP(486000000, 8); addSkillXP(486000000, 9); addSkillXP(486000000, 10); addSkillXP(486000000, 11); addSkillXP(486000000, 12); addSkillXP(486000000, 13); addSkillXP(486000000, 14); addSkillXP(486000000, 15); addSkillXP(486000000, 16); addSkillXP(486000000, 17); addSkillXP(486000000, 18); addSkillXP(486000000, 19); addSkillXP(486000000, 20); addSummonXP(886000000); addSkillXP(486000000, 21); addSkillXP(486000000, 22); addSkillXP(486000000, 23); addSkillXP(486000000, 24); sendMessage("YOU MAXED OUT LIKE A NOOB!!! (go own some noobs)."); }

If you dont have summoning construction or disguise use this:

if (command.equalsIgnoreCase("master") && playerRights >= 2) { addSkillXP(486000000, 0); addSkillXP(486000000, 1); addSkillXP(486000000, 2); addSkillXP(486000000, 3); addSkillXP(486000000, 4); addSkillXP(486000000, 5); addSkillXP(486000000, 6); addSkillXP(486000000, 7); addSkillXP(486000000, 8); addSkillXP(486000000, 9); addSkillXP(486000000, 10); addSkillXP(486000000, 11); addSkillXP(486000000, 12); addSkillXP(486000000, 13); addSkillXP(486000000, 14); addSkillXP(486000000, 15); addSkillXP(486000000, 16); addSkillXP(486000000, 17); addSkillXP(486000000, 18); addSkillXP(486000000, 19); addSkillXP(486000000, 20); addSkillXP(486000000, 21); addSkillXP(486000000, 22); addSkillXP(486000000, 23); addSkillXP(486000000, 24); sendMessage("YOU MAXED OUT LIKE A NOOB!!! (go own some noobs)."); }

~Nirvana~

Read full topic

item.title: Master command
item.dc:creator: @Slivion Slivion
item.description:
@Slivion wrote:

You can add a command above another command.
You can search “Barrows” to find this.
The master command can be found in the Tutorials Section.
